title: Black Skies Riviera
description: An arranged marriage mafia romance where love is a debt no sinner can payâ€¦ Issa Dubova is the queen of cloudy diamonds:A Bratva princess.My reluctant new wife.A pretty bargain in exchange for the names of the men who killed my father. I'm a black suit of spades:Determined to bury both her and my demons.I never asked to see the shape of her heart.I never asked for her to fill the blank spaces of mine. But the mafia wants her secrets.I'm not the first she betrayed.And Issa? Sweet, not-so-innocent Issa?She's now a debt no sinner can pay. Black Skies Riviera is a heart-stopping, enemies to lovers romance with NO cliff-hanger and a guaranteed HEA. For mature readers only.
author: Catherine Wiltcher
